column1: Baby Barnaby's////My wife and I finally had a day off together and decided that going out for breakfast would be a nice way to kick it off. I'd read good things about BBC so we came here this AM. Since other reviewers had warned us about long lines
column2: we arrived promptly at 8:05. No wait
column3: but the inside was already about full (warning: this place really is as small as others have stated - think 15' x 20' space). We found the one remaining booth and sat down. Â The inside is a fun mix of colors and it has a great cozy feeling. Very nice atmosphere for breakfast. Plus
